newsitem.title: FRANCE: PRESS DIGEST - France - Le Monde Jan 2.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - France - Le Monde Jan 2.

text.p: These are leading stories in afternoon daily Le Monde.
-- Shooting at Hebron highlights need to hasten impending accord between Israel and Palestine to transfer most of West Bank Hebron city to Palestinian rule.

-- Renault and PSA carmakers registered a further cut in their market shares in 1996, down to 26.6 percent and 29.4 percent respectively. Foreign makers took better advantage of government's aid to car sector and totalled 44 percent of new car sales in France. Further price cuts are expected.
-- A price cut trend is expected in the auto insurance market.
